meanings.definition: The technology of sending and receiving sound over long distances using telephones.
meanings.sent1: Telephony has made it easier to talk to people far away.
meanings.sent2: I learned about telephony in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The aliens were amazed by our telephony technology.
meanings.sent4: In the world of telephony, distance is just a number.
meanings.sent5: The history of telephony is fascinating to study.

meanings.definition: The practice of using telephones to communicate with others.
meanings.sent1: Telephony has changed the way we stay in touch with loved ones.
meanings.sent2: I rely on telephony to stay connected with my friends.
meanings.sent3: The telephony in our office is always busy with calls.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed through the telephony system.
meanings.sent5: Telephony allows us to hear the voices of those far away.
